external_references.description: Kirill Boychenko. (2025, July 14). Contagious Interview Campaign Escalates With 67 Malicious npm Packages and New Malware Loader. Retrieved October 19, 2025.

objects.description: [Contagious Interview](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1052) has configured malware to remove archives used in collection activities following successful exfiltration.(Citation: Socket BeaverTail XORIndex HexEval Contagious Interview July 2025)
